actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A joint resolution to clarify and reaffirm Government purchasing policies.

summary.text: Expresses the general policy of the United States Government to rely upon private commercial sources for the goods and services required to meet Government needs, unless: (1) such reliance disrupts or delays an urgent agency program; (2) in-house performance is mandatory for national security; or (3) the product or service is not available from the private sector.

titles.title: A joint resolution to clarify and reaffirm Government purchasing policies.
